alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Gadsden; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 28 at 3:17PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Gulf, eastern Bay and Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida, south central Gadsden and Liberty Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 415 PM EDT/315 PM CDT/... At 317 PM EDT/217 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles west of Blountstown to 6 miles east of Callaway to 23 miles southwest of Panama City Beach. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Callaway, Blountstown, Springfield, Mexico Beach, Hiland Park, Stonemill Creek, Tyndall Air Force Base, Orange, Parker, Wewahitchka, Bristol, Honeyville, Moose Pond, Clarksville, Abe Springs, Allanton and Vilas. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Gadsden; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf; Liberty
